statements: SELECT * FROM Transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, timestamp, transaction_type FROM Transactions;
SELECT transaction_type, amount FROM Transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Transactions ORDER BY transaction_id DESC;
SELECT AVG(amount) AS average_amount FROM Transactions;
SELECT * FROM Transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Deposit';
SELECT AVG(amount) AS average_amount FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Withdrawal';
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM Transactions ORDER BY amount DESC, timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM Transactions WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-01-31';
SELECT * FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_id = 1;
SELECT buyer_id, seller_id, item_name FROM Transactions WHERE buyer_id = 10;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type, transaction_timestamp FROM Transactions WHERE seller_id = 5 ORDER BY transaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Users WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT address, phone_number FROM Users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT transaction_id, item_name, buyer_id, seller_id, transaction_type, transaction_timestamp FROM Transactions;
SELECT item_name, buyer_id, seller_id, transaction_timestamp FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_type='sale' ORDER BY transaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT item_name, buyer_id, seller_id FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_type='purchase' AND transaction_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-06-30 23:59:59';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email, phone_number, address FROM Users WHERE user_id IN (SELECT buyer_id FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_type='purchase');
SELECT * FROM Transactions WHERE seller_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM Users WHERE address LIKE '%New York%') AND transaction_type='sale';
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_id DESC;
SELECT transaction_type, timestamp FROM transactions WHERE transaction_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT * FROM transactions LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type, DATE(timestamp) AS date FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'buy' AND date(timestamp) = CURDATE();

SELECT user_id, username, email, COUNT(transaction_id) AS total_transactions FROM users LEFT JOIN transactions ON users.user_id = transactions.transaction_id GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_transactions DESC;
SELECT * FROM Transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, product_id FROM Transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_type FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_type='purchase';
SELECT * FROM Transactions ORDER BY transaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM Transactions;
SELECT * FROM Transactions WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, product_id FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase' AND transaction_amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_timestamp ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM Transactions WHERE product_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY user_id ASC, transaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT MAX(transaction_amount) AS max_transaction_amount FROM Transactions;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'sale';
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM Users WHERE phone_number = '123-456-7890';
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE stock_quantity > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, timestamp FROM Transactions WHERE amount > 1000 AND transaction_type = 'Purchase' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT vendor_name, location, contact_person FROM Vendors WHERE location = 'New York' OR location = 'California';
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, timestamp FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;

SELECT Users.username, Transactions.amount, Products.product_name FROM Users JOIN Transactions ON Users.user_id = Transactions.user_id JOIN Products ON Transactions.product_id = Products.product_id WHERE Products.price > 50;
SELECT vendor_name, location FROM Vendors WHERE vendor_id IN (SELECT vendor_id FROM Products WHERE price < 30);
SELECT Users.username, COUNT(*) AS transaction_count FROM Users JOIN Transactions ON Users.user_id = Transactions.user_id GROUP BY Users.username HAVING transaction_count > 3;
